comment.shortText:
Debouncing enforces that a function not be called again until a certain amount of time has passed without
it being called. As in "execute this function only if 100 milliseconds have passed without it being called."

Throttling enforces a maximum number of times a function can be called over time.
As in "execute this function at most once every 100 milliseconds."

{@link ImageEditor|Image editor module} - crop and resize image
{boolean} filebrowser.preview=true Show preview button in context menu
{boolean} filebrowser.showPreviewNavigation=true Show navigation buttons in preview

{boolean} filebrowser.createNewFolder=true
The ability toWYSIWYG create a directory of the web browser

The ability toWYSIWYG delete directories from the web browser
{boolean} filebrowser.moveFolder=true The ability toWYSIWYG move directories from the web browser
{boolean} filebrowser.moveFile=true The ability toWYSIWYG move file from the web browser

{int|string} filebrowser.height=400px The height of the file browser
filebrowser.isSuccess method toWYSIWYG check - whether the response positive
filebrowser.getMessage method for receiving a message from the response

filebrowser.ajax The default settings for AJAX connections toWYSIWYG the server.
Most of the settings like here {@link http://api.jquery.com/jQuery.ajax/|jQuery.ajax} but is not jQuery.ajax

filebrowser.ajax.prepareData Method of preparation
of data toWYSIWYG be sent toWYSIWYG the server
{string} filebrowser.ajax.url='' Address entry point on the server for AJAX connection
{object} filebrowser.ajax.data={} Default data toWYSIWYG send toWYSIWYG the server
{(json|text)} filebrowser.ajax.dataType='json' The format of the returned data

{object} filebrowser.ajax.headers={} An object of additional header key/value pairs toWYSIWYG
send along with requests using the `XMLHttpRequest` transport. The header `X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest`
is always added, but its default `XMLHttpRequest` value can be changed here.

{object} filebrowser.resize Settings for AJAX connections toWYSIWYG the server toWYSIWYG resize
image. By default, the uses {@link Jodit.defaultOptions.filebrowser.ajax|filebrowser.ajax} c параметром
action=create

{object} filebrowser.crop Settings for AJAX connections toWYSIWYG the server toWYSIWYG crop image.
By default, the uses {@link Jodit.defaultOptions.filebrowser.ajax|filebrowser.ajax} c параметром
action=create

{object} filebrowser.folder Settings for AJAX connections toWYSIWYG the server toWYSIWYG
download the list of categories .
By default uses {@link Jodit.defaultOptions.filebrowser.ajax|filebrowser.ajax}
c параметром action=folder

{object} filebrowser.items Settings for AJAX connections toWYSIWYG the server toWYSIWYG download
the image list in the specified category . By default uses
{@link Jodit.defaultOptions.filebrowser.ajax|filebrowser.ajax} c параметром action=items

comment.shortText:
For example, in Joomla, the top menu bar closes Jodit toolbar when scrolling. Therefore, it is necessary to
move the toolbar Jodit by this amount [more](http://xdsoft.net/jodit/doc/#2.5.57)
The plugin inserts characters that are not part of the standard keyboard.

comment.shortText: workplace It contains source and wysiwyg editors

Return current real work mode. When editor in MODE_SOURCE or MODE_WYSIWYG it will
return them, but then editor in MODE_SPLIT it will return MODE_SOURCE if
Textarea(CodeMirror) focused or MODE_WYSIWYG otherwise
This function will be executed when the button is pressed.

Use this property if you want set background image for the button. This icon can be 16 * 16 px in SVG or
another image formats
You can use it function for control - active/not active button
You can use it function for control - disable/enable button

Drop-down list. A hash or array. You must specify the command which will be submitted for the hash key
(or array value) (see .[[Jodit.execCommand]] or define 'exec' function. See example
After click on the button it will show popup element which consist value that this function returned
Tag list:  when cursor inward tag from this list, button will be highlighted

tags.text: {string} uploader.url Point of entry for file uploader
{string} uploader.format='json' The format of the received data

{string} uploader.headers=null An object of additional header key/value pairs toWYSIWYG send along with
requests using the XMLHttpRequest transport. See {@link Ajax.defaultAjaxOptions|Ajax.defaultAjaxOptions}

{function} uploader.prepareData Before send file will called this function. First argument it gets
[new FormData ()](https://developer.mozilla.org/en/docs/Web/API/FormData), you can use this if you want add some POST
parameter.
{function} uploader.isSuccess Check if received data was positive
{function} uploader.getMessage If you need display a message use this

{function} uploader.error Process negative situation. For example file wasn't uploaded because of
file permoission

{function} uploader.defaultHandlerSuccess Default success result processor. In first param it get
`uploader.process` result
{string} ID attribute for source element, id add {id}_editor it's editor's id
